SELECT A.NICKNAME, A.M_NUM, B.PRO_NUM, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT , B.PRICE, B.ADDR, B.UUID, B.UPLOADPATH, B.FILENAME, B.REP FROM MEMBER A , (SELECT C.PRO_NUM, C.M_NUM, D.TITLE, D.CONTENT , D.PRICE, D.ADDR, D.UUID, D.UPLOADPATH , D.FILENAME, D.REP FROM LIKELIST C , (SELECT E.PRO_NUM, E.TITLE, E.CONTENT , E.PRICE, E.ADDR, F.UUID, F.UPLOADPATH, F.FILENAME, F.REP FROM PRODUCTION E, PRODUCTION_UPLOAD F WHERE E.PRO_NUM = F.PRO_NUM) D WHERE C.PRO_NUM = D.PRO_NUM) B WHERE A.M_NUM = B.M_NUM AND A.M_NUM = #{m_num} AND B.REP = 1
